item.title: Authenticating Spring Boot apps on AKS with MSI
item.description: Last week I was looking for the best solution to connect to Azure services for a few pods within Azure Kubernetes Service. These services are build with Spring Boot and my first idea was to only connect to Azure KeyVault. Along the way I discovered the awesomeness of Managed Service Identities and extended it to another Azure Service, Azure Storage.
